subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following is a famous palace in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में किस पल्क जगहित है?
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort is a popular and famous palace located in Jodhpur, Rajasthan. It is a major tourist attraction and exhibits the rich history and culture of the region.
